About Me / Travel / Fashion / Food / Fails /

About Me

25 is such a strange age, some people believe you should have your life sorted, your job, hobbies, house, friends and love life.

I belive i'm only just starting chapter one of figuring out my life.

I recently finished university, moved to Scotland, moved in with my lifelong roomate also known as a husband, left all my friends, family and everything i've ever known.

So simply put litrally having a midlife crises. Yet this is the most exciting time of my life.

Living in a new city, new job, new career prospects, starting to travel, finding my style, experimenting with life and reinventing myself.

Making sure all the motivational videos and affirmations I watched didn't go to waste.
